successes.title: 100 More Years of Analog Film
successes.description: Help FILM Ferrania build the factory of the future and the first batch of film is your reward.

Pledges.description: Back our project for any amount less than $15 and we'll show our thanks by adding your name to our online Founders Wall.
Receive a reproduction vintage Ferrania postcard, postmarked from Italy and hand-signed by founders Nicola Baldini and Marco Pagni + your name on the Founders Wall
FIRST 500 • 1 roll of 35mm film from the first 500 numbered rolls + Ferrania sticker pack + your name on the Founders Wall
SNAP PACK • 1 roll of 35mm film + 1 roll of 120 film + Ferrania sticker pack + your name on the Founders Wall
35 SHOOTER • 2 rolls of 35mm film + Ferrania sticker pack + your name on the Founders Wall
120 SHOOTER • 2 rolls of 120 film + Ferrania sticker pack + your name on the Founders Wall
SUPER 8 SHOOTER • One Super 8 movie film cartridge + Ferrania sticker pack + your name on the Founders Wall
35 LOVER • 4 rolls of 35mm film + Ferrania sticker pack + your name on the Founders Wall
120 LOVER • 4 rolls of 120 film + Ferrania sticker pack + your name on the Founders Wall
FILM IS ALIVE PACK • 2 rolls of 35mm film + 2 rolls of 120 film + Ferrania sticker pack + your name on the Founders Wall
16mm SHOOTER • One 16mm movie film spool + Ferrania sticker pack + your name on the Founders Wall
MOVIE CLIP PACK • 1 cartridge of Super 8 movie film + 1 spool of 16mm movie film + Ferrania sticker pack + your name on the Founders Wall
FILM IS ALIVE COLLECTOR BOX •  One piece each of 35mm, 120, Super 8 and 16mm film with matching numbers in a display box + Ferrania sticker pack + your name on the Founders Wall
BIG BOY PACK • 4 rolls of 35mm film + 4 rolls of 120 film + Ferrania sticker pack + your name on the Founders Wall
MOVIEMAKER 8 • 3x Super 8 movie film cartridges  + Ferrania sticker pack + your name on the Founders Wall
FILMBURNER 35 • 10x rolls of 35mm film + Ferrania sticker pack + your name on the Founders Wall
FILMBURNER 120 • 10x rolls of 120 film + Ferrania sticker pack + your name on the Founders Wall
FILMMAKER 16 • 3x 16mm movie film spools  + Ferrania sticker pack + your name on the Founders Wall
DOUBLEBURNER • 10x rolls of 35mm film + 10x rolls of 120 film + Ferrania sticker pack + your name on the Founders Wall
NAMING RIGHTS • Name one room in the FILM Ferrania factory + your choice of any 3 rewards of $300 or less (see full description at left)
PRIVATE SCREENING • Private screening for 10 people in one of 5 cities + your choice of any 4 rewards of $500 or less (see full description at left)
SUPER 8 EVENT • Your special event, filmed on Super 8 by Nicola Baldini + Braun Nizo Super 8 camera + 10 Super 8 cartridges (see full description at left)
